TEXT.English: Dancing improves the chance of inspiring Great Artists.

Some birds are said to dance and these dances inspired early human dances.
Recent studies indicate that humans, parrots and elephants are the only creatures that really dance!

Young foxes practicing their mouse hunting moves look like they are dancing for the sheer joy of it. This is said to have inspired early human dances.
Recent studies indicate that humans, parrots and elephants are the only creatures that really dance!

The haka is a ceremonial dance or challenge in Polynesian culture. It is a posture dance performed by a group, with vigorous movements and stamping of the feet with rhythmically shouted accompaniment.
